pages.title: Magick Context
pages.text: Everything you want to express is in it

The Magick Context is the crystallization of various materials. Before we cast the magic, the mana flows out of our body and is transmitted to the spirit product. If the spirit product itself does not carry attributes, the magick context will use itself to lead the mana.

Ordinary spirit products can be installed as long as they are combined with a Magick Context separately, but a spirit product can usually only carry one Magick Context, and some spirit products have their own attributes, so they cannot be equipped with Magick Context.
